en: Out of the depths have I cried unto thee, O Jehovah.
hmr: Aw LALPA, tui inthûktakainthawk hin ka ko che hi.

en: Lord, hear my voice: Let thine ears be attentive To the voice of my supplications.
hmr: LALPA, ka râwl hi lo ngai la, Lunginsiet ka hnina râwl hi, I nain lo ngai raw se.

en: If thou, Jehovah, shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who could stand?
hmr: LALPA, nangin rîtlonahai în chik chun, Aw LALPA, tu am ngîr an ti leh?

en: But there is forgiveness with thee, That thou mayest be feared.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, i kuomah ngaidamna a um a nih, Ṭiha i um theina dingin.

en: I wait for Jehovah, my soul doth wait, And in his word do I hope.
hmr: LALPA chu ka nghâk zing a, ka hringna hin a nghâk zing a, A thu khawm ka beisei a nih.

en: My soul waiteth for the Lord More than watchmen wait for the morning; Yea, more than watchmen for the morning.
hmr: Vêngtuhaiin khawvar an thlîr nêka nasain, Anih, vêngtuhaiin khawvar an thlîr nêka nasa hmanin, Ka hringna hin LALPA chu a thlîr zing hlak a nih.

en: O Israel, hope in Jehovah; For with Jehovah there is lovingkindness, And with him is plenteous redemption.
hmr: Aw Israelhai, LALPA chu beisei ro; LALPA kuoma chun ngilneina a um sih a, A kuomah intlanna tamtak a um bawk a.

en: And he will redeem Israel From all his iniquities.
hmr: Chuongchun, ama chun Israelhai chu, An rîtlona po poa inthawkin sansuok a tih.
